data.actual_result: You can type in the text box, but not send a message
data.expected_result: You shouldn't be able to type in the text box
data.short_description: Sharing something into a channel you are unathorized to speak in, allows you to type in the text box.
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a channel you are unauthorized to send messages in - Close Discord entirely - Go to a different app, and share something to Discord - Examine text box
